title: Export Parquet + View DDL Pipeline
description: Export all 15 DuckDB tables as ZSTD-compressed Parquet files to scripts/the_lab/dashboard/data/sql_lab/. Export all 52 view DDL statements as a single SQL file (views.sql). Create a generate_sql_lab_data.py script that automates this export pipeline. Include a table_metadata.json with column names, data types, row counts, and human-readable descriptions for each table. This is the data foundation — TKT-B depends on it.

florentino_gate.reason: Film Room shipped and live — retroactive approval

founder_validation.feedback: Film Room shipped and verified live
